Text: "Fallin' is a collaboration between Scottish power pop band Teenage Fanclub and American alternative hip hop trio De La Soul.

Text: Fallin' (Teenage Fanclub and De La Soul song):  The song was recorded for the soundtrack to the action film "Judgment Night", which featured other collaborations between well-known rock, metal and hip hop groups.
